Page Title
Sleepover
Address: West Thames College, London Road, Isleworth, TW7 4HS
Date: Monday 14th April
Time: 7:00pm—8:00am on Tuesday morning
————————————————————————————————–—————————————————————-
RSVP
If you are under the age of 18 and would like to attend, then you must register for a ticket on Eventbrite and like our Facebook page. There are a limited number of tickets available.
Facebook:
Eventbrite:
You have been invited to your friends Sleepover. There will be cake and music and films and popcorn and sleeping bags and laughs.
Except your friend is homeless.
You will need to bring…
· Sleeping bag and pillow
· Waterproofs
· Clothes—lots of layers
· 1 tin of food for Food Bank
· Snacks
· Torch (if you have one)
More details will be sent out prior to the Sleepover.
Your Youth
Board presents...
